name: Team Sponsorship
description: Sponsor one or more AGSA teams for the season.
benefits: Business name listed on team materials
fulfillmentRequirements: Logo as PNG, SVG, or EPS by March 1, 2026

name: Silver Partner
description: Expanded visibility across AGSA channels and events.
benefits: Featured logo placement on AGSA sponsor page
fulfillmentRequirements: Logo in vector format preferred by March 1, 2026

name: Gold Partner
description: High-impact brand presence for the full season.
benefits: Premier sponsor callout in seasonal communications
fulfillmentRequirements: High-res logo package and brand guide by March 1, 2026

name: Grand Slam Partner
description: Top-tier partnership with maximum AGSA visibility.
benefits: Top placement in AGSA sponsor sections
Priority mention in major outreach and event materials
fulfillmentRequirements: Complete brand assets and approvals by March 1, 2026
